title: Riot, Nautilus can't clear the jungle anymore. He is less than 1% play rate because he sucks
body:
He was at a 50% win rate and his mana costs were increased for some bizarre reason and now he can't even get to his 4th camp on his first clear without going oom (unless you start blue buff). This is getting incredibly tiresome after playing this game for years as somebody that enjoys the tank role, I see the same champs getting dumpstered over and over again as soon as they become somewhat playable because heaven forbid somebody can actually CC Lee Sin, Ekko and Yasuo and their incredibly bloated and overpowered kits and provide some form of peel. Nautilus already does so little damage that ADC's are happy when he's around because he's a big fat barrel of lifesteal to heal up after a fight. He already moves about the same speed as Rammus with his fun new 400% self inflicted slow on his W. 

Either revert the changes from 2 years ago and put offensive power back into his shield or give him bonus damage on jungle camps. This is ridiculous that I even have to write this into the boards because the balance team should have recognized this immediately on the PBE.

-Salty player that likes Nautilus
